channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 end higher on Big Tech rally, while Dow lags and closes lower
GOP senators not in rush to consider Lisa Cook replacement on Fed until case resolved
item.description: President Donald Trump is seeking to fire Fed Board Governor Lisa Cook, citing allegations of mortgage fraud by her. Cook denies any wrongdoing.

item.title: Ban on congressional stock ownership gains momentum with new bill
item.description: A ban on congressional stock trades is gaining momentum after a bipartisan group of lawmakers have unified around a single proposal.

item.title: Markets entering a new ‘postmodern’ era, Goldman says. How investors can win.
Judge voids $2.2 billion Harvard funding freeze by Trump administration
item.description: The Trump administration in April froze grants to Harvard University over concerns about antisemitism on the Ivy League campus and other concerns.

item.title: Fed officials struggle to explain slowing economy, adding to rate-cut prospects
Slower hiring, wary consumers: Fed’s beige book points to sluggish U.S. economy
Trump calls Epstein files a distraction from his success as victims call for their release
item.description: President Donald Trump faces growing calls in Congress to release the Epstein files, which related to his former friend Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine ...

item.title: Salesforce posts earnings beat, but stock's drop shows investors' AI concerns
Newsmax sues Fox News for allegedly abusing monopoly power
item.description: Newsmax filed a lawsuit accusing conservative news giant Fox News of suppressing its right-leaning competitors.
